        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 itemprop="name" class="text-center medium-text-left">1 Million Rabanne <small style='white-space: nowrap'>for men</small></h1></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="3747" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="3747" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.73</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="20046">20,046</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1999"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>1 Million</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. <b>1 Million</b> was launched in 2008. 1 Million was created by Christophe Raynaud, Olivier Pescheux, Michel Girard and Christian Dussoulier. Top notes are Blood Mandarin, Grapefruit and Mint; middle notes are Cinnamon, Spicy Notes and Rose; base notes are Amber, Leather, Woody Notes and Indian Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The house of Paco Rabanne's fragrance for men is announced as a fresh and sensual blend of notes, with glittery shine of gold, for which creator Paco Rabanne says the following: "In all civilizations and religions gold has always managed to seduce people". Gold is all around us: in architecture, design, jewelry, clothes, accessories, fashion...It is noticeable and respected worldwide and it possesses divine notes. The bottle of this edition for men is created in golden nuances. It represents power, wealth, luxury, durability...
</p>

<p>The perfume was inspired by Paco Rabanne's metallic fashion and created in cooperation with three famous noses for perfumes, Christophe Raynaud, Olivier Pescheux and Michel Girard, who mixed this year's edition from the notes of sparkling grapefruit, red orange, mint, rose, cinnamon, spices, blond leather, blond wood, patchouli and amber. 
</p>

<p>The perfume is available in the amount of 50 and 100 ml, as an edt and with accompanying body care products. 1 Million arrived in August 2008.</p>

<p>1 Million 18 Carats is a LUXE edition that captures with its provocative notes, only for the privileged buyers. The package is very luxurious, made of golden body with a diamond crown. Each bottle is separately numerated and the edition is limited. The outer package  a case that holds a golden lever, is created by Noe Duchaufour-Lawrence.
</p>

<p>
Let us remind you of the fragrant composition: the perfumers behind it are Christophe Raynaud, Olivier Pescheux and Michel Girard, and the notes are: sexy blood orange, grapefruit, cinnamon, mint, rose, spices, light leather, white wood, patchouli and amber. The new bottle of 1 Million 18 carats is available in 100 ml and it can be re-filed with the perfume.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="3747"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83555498052084; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.82.jpg" style="width: 2.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mandarin-Orange-82.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Blood Mandarin</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.76.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Grapefruit-76.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Grapefruit</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.160.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mint-160.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mint</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.65.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cinnamon-65.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cinnamon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92323619588367; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.321.jpg" style="width: 3.45rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Spicy-Notes-321.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Spicy Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9567189380854; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 3.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.91534771090672; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.156.jpg" style="width: 3.4rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Leather-156.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Leather</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82555956097059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 2.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woody Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Indian Patchouli</div></div></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353989" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="buzhurt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="buzhurt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353989ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353989" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); All the clones Ive tried were pretty much spot on, maybe even cleaner when hitting the nose so I would look into that unless you really like the bottle or something</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842369">Pinkmeat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>lol revisiting this over 10 years later. I originally got it as a gift when I was probably 19/20 and honestly I didnt care for it. But I used it till the bottle was empty and never looked at ever getting a 1 million again lol. Fast forward to present day and I just figured what the heck I have a sample that was part of a sampler set and I have no clue what to wear today lets just use up this little 1ml. Umm I might just get a 50ml now. Its really enjoyable and not anywhere as sweet as I remember it being and not anywhere as sweet as the modern mens releases have been lately. This is so enjoyable like why? lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2347918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2347918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2347014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347014" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="desmosfitz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2084924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2084924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="desmosfitz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-Parfum-73664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted Parfum"title="The Most Wanted Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2084924">desmosfitz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 19:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crazy people call this npc when all current winter scents smell very similar, this stands out and I really like it I would probably wear it more if it didnt remind me of my grandpa since he used to wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is a cinnamon dominant fragrance, with an actually good atomizer. Dont let the internet fool you. I dont have a full bottle, but Ill get some soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2345456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2345456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Award winning Perfumer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Award winning Perfumer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847082">Award winning Perfumer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 23:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its 2024 and this one still smells good and its affordable. Mandarin orange is done well here. Newer batches are lacking in the longevity department but the scent itself is a nice smooth blend that is sweet and a little spicy. I still enjoy this one in the fall and winter. I recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2344912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2344912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073182">rev0lut10n</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 16:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overhated and a victim of its own success. Many negative reviews here are the association with the people who wear it or negative memories related to it.<br />
<br />
The scent itself is actually good, especially if you love cinnamon and sweet scents.<br />
<br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2343633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2343633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342914" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScottyFrags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2307627"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2307627.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScottyFrags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Lemon-Mint-39181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Lemon Mint"title="Aoud Lemon Mint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2307627">ScottyFrags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 02:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the scent i personally hate the most. <br />
But hear me out, there are a number of reasons for this.<br />
I bought it when it first released, purely because everyone else did and it was the 'in' fragrance at that time.<br />
As a result of everyone copping it together, every 3rd guy i walked past smelt of it and ultimately put me off and i began to hate it. Every guy in the club reeked of half a bottle of it in one use and it was sickly and pungent to be around.<br />
All that aside, its not a BAD scent and doesn't smell bad at all really, i think it's just run its course and was so overdone by all and still is by plenty of men, that its just something I've grown to hate. So much so, that i dislike the smell of it for those reasons. <br />
Probably more a psychological hatred than it is a dislike because its genuinely bad, which it isn't...if that makes any sense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2342914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2342914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2309673">ffinian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Horrid. Its not an awful scent by itself, despite being slightly too powdery. No, this fragrance is awful because of the sub-par clientele that it attracts. Walking through town, I smell this on approximately one in every eight men, and nearly all of those one in eight are chavs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2341307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2341307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; More than a fragrance, it was the pioneer and set a huge standard in the industry - achieving the level of success this fragrance had is unmatched.<br />
No batch issues just consistent and when this landed in the shops everyone and their brother knew about it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2340064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2340064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gehaat door allen die zelf succes nastreven.<br />
Een baken in de tijd.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2338929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2338929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334873" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KriHol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1438938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KriHol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Chergui-2762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chergui"title="Chergui"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438938">KriHol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paco Rabanne One Million is a luxurious blend of citrus, cinnamon, and leather, offering a bold, seductive, and long-lasting scent. Perfect for nights out, its both warm and sophisticated, with a unique, memorable edge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2334873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2334873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rmcgrat1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305185"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rmcgrat1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); To me it smells like a leather jacket with cinnamon sticks in the pockets. The rose note peaks through slightly in the opening for me but it doesnt stay for long. I dont like the bottle design but that doesnt really matter as long as the fragrance smells good.<br />
<br />
Great for the cooler weather, and it would suit a younger man well. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2333829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2333829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I always loved the opening of this fragrance even before jeremy said this has the best opening of all time, i always said that. But i dont like the drydown so much, maybe its the leather cinamon combo. But im happy i purchased this. Even its sooo extreme sweet, this is pure masculinity. Some People say its performance sucks. But i asked so mayn people what they wearing and often it was 1 million and i also noticed that. i smelled them from far away, and they said they applied in the morning. so this juice can only be strong. This is really fruity, spiciness attraction pure. the best thing is u should wear it now. because a lot people dont wear it now. because i 2008 everybody had this thing, this is also something why i didnt bought it, because i dont like to smell like others.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I think this stuff is a classic, and it has its issues, but it's still amazing. If you have no idea what you're getting into, I would sample it first, but I and a buddy of mine love it, and I thought it was more loved than this. At this point, it might be outclassed by some things out there, but it still does it's own thing, and it's still unique enough. Anyway, it's a bubblegummy sweet one, and I think it's still the best in the million line and warrants a hands-on investigation for anyone looking for a good, sweet cold weather or youthful scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316577" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hasibhafed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1895292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1895292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hasibhafed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316577ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316577" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1895292">Hasibhafed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's one of the most complement getter in any situation. You would be confident in any occasion. When I am out of choice it works perfectly but only for colder weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2316577"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2316577#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316549" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cranjis McBasketball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2233541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cranjis McBasketball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-de-Sistelle/Thallium-19776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Thallium"title="Thallium"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); Probably the sexiest men's fragrance on the market. Good for colder weather and more formal situations, great for dates. Smells like sweet leather IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2316549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2316549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautifully woodsy, spicy and sweet, this composition still resonates with many no matter the age bracket. Very decent performance to boot.<br />

If found on discounter websites, can be had for a nice bargain you most likely wont regret!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2315585"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2315585#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Longevity I get 5 or 6 hours/projection is alright</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2303533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2303533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302444" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302444" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joanofarc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joanofarc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273768">joanofarc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wear this cologne as one of my signature scents so I'm definitely biased, but this is a top tier fragrance for both men and women. Perhaps one of the best of all time. <br />
<br />
It smells like money, and not in a Baccarat Rouge way. It's not lavish or overindulgent, but definitely bold. Very unique. This scent is fresh from the citrus top notes and deep from the leather, amber, and wood base notes. It smells like a woman in a pinstripe suit.<br />
<br />
I adore the packaging as well. The gold bar is honestly what caught my eye in the first place. If you want a sleek, minimal bottle, Rabanne is the wrong brand for you. Playfulness and unconventionality is engrained in Rabanne's identity, and that's what you get with their scents as well.<br />
<br />
10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2302444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2302444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301714" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zono"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zono" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301714ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301714" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087085">Zono</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Azuby?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2301714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2301714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297728" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="semyonsemyoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="semyonsemyoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624">semyonsemyoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-28">09/28/24 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soapy grapefruit, a bit of mint, sweetness from the rose and all is peppered with cinnamon. Can't say much about the base - it's so common there's no point. <br />
This mint grapefruit feels gely and yes, gives a sensation of toothpaste. I think this soapiness gives off a childish impression, though I don't think it was initially marketed as a teenage go-to.<br />
You can't say it's cheap. It's nice, crowdpleasing. But to me the rose sticks out too much and doesn't fit in. And sometimes the sweetness gets sickening just like with Invictus. There are much sweeter fragrances that don't feel so obnoxious. I wonder what the problem is.<br />
<br />
Has a potential of being unisex because of the rose and sweetness. Doesn't feel very manly (hence the childish aspect). The rose is a lot like Kenzo Flower.<br />
<br />
Also: you have to understand that with 1 Million Paco Rabanne took over the market at the time. I think it's a big achievement. Something to sleep over. How to these things happen...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2297728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2297728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293076" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="setfox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="setfox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293076ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293076" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906157">setfox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 20:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it. Good choice out of department store brands. Warm, sweet, spicy, woody, but not adventurous. It was one of my early samples ages ago and I went back for a full bottle, but now that I've branched out it doesn't see too much use.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289893" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nastyenka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1769121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1769121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nastyenka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Holy-Water-5967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Holy Water"title="Holy Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1769121">nastyenka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This starts out as a young man's take on Old Spice and gets progressively screechier from there. Of course, it doesn't help that my prime dating years were right after this frag came out and every third guy was wearing it. Much like the dudes I dated back then, 1 Million tries hard and can have its moments, but it lacks finesse, originality, and tact.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashkan13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashkan13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242419">ashkan13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 17:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hate to be that guy but after buying other stuff I have come to the conclusion I don't like this... cinnamon is too strong and it's a little low quality compared to other stuff I like. Does give me a headache. I hope I'll like it again.<br />
<br />
Update: it's pretty cool actually. I've been comparing it with all of my favourite fragrances, this one beats a lot of others... quite expensive actually I even bought the new K Intense cheaper than I bought this. Wow. <br />
<br />
This has just got such good performance. I really like Dolce Gabbana scents but all of them last only 2 hours... this one isn't like that. You get something that performs really well and it's important. I guess I'm sensitive to rose, because Antaeus by Chanel gives me a headache too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2281950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2281950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279353" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BaderSw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BaderSw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Morning-Chess-30930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Morning Chess"title="Morning Chess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);
