Yeah it old, yeah a lot of people use it, but still the scent is amazing. <br />
<br />
 I used to wear this fragrances when I was a child until my late teens. To this day every time I smell this fragrance I realize why it became so famous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2279353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2279353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279066" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jweber4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242134"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jweber4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242134">jweber4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 07:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One million is severely over-hated by fragrance experts and influencers but proves to be a great introduction scent. Strong citrus opening followed by a spicy, warm, cinnamon, and patchouli dry-down. Good performance, and a solid blind-buy for a rather versatile scent. Not a sophisticated or niche fragrance, but does not deserve the abundant hate it receives. Not the best of the 1 Million lineup, but you can get a large bottle for cheap and make it last forever. Great starter fragrance in my opinion,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2279066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2279066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278641" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KerriZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KerriZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615">KerriZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good strong steady starter scent. I can see how it could be a starter fragrance for young men. It has the right balance of citrus and spice in a cozy - snuggle up to your dates neck - kind of way. Has good longevity and not expensive. <br />
<br />
 It reminded me of the most suave latin man on the salsa dance floor. Tight black pants, beautiful crisp white buttoned down shirt...buttoned down to there. He knows how to swing his hips and spin his girl.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2278641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2278641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277327" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragrancecoin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204151"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragrancecoin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204151">fragrancecoin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 16:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know you're living in the matrix when they got men to wear this fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2277327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2277327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="littlest_lemon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/858148"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.858148.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="littlest_lemon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Juliette-90396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Juliette"title="Juliette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/858148">littlest_lemon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 05:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>straight up snickerdoodle cookies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2272291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2272291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 Million in 2024. <br />
<br />
If you just started collecting, chances are you find this fragrance astounding. <br />
<br />
For a long time I didn't understand when people would say "you'll grow out of this scent" or "you like it now but you'll realize how many better fragrances there are out there". This "longevity Test" is what truly determines whether you love a fragrance or not.<br />
<br />
Out of the many starter fragrances, only a few have stood the test of time. After my 120+ collection, I still love Eros, I adore Acqua Di Gio, &amp; I think Invictus is a good dumb-reach fragrance.<br />
<br />
... and then there's 1 Million.<br />
Over the years, this scent has gained its reputation for being a college clubbing scent for f-boys &amp; it continues to hold that name. What I will say is this is still a great starter scent, especially since you're probably still in school if you started wearing perfume regularly: something to get you familiar with cold weather scents &amp; sweet &amp; spicy notes. But if you can make it through a whole bottle, I recommend you try something else before you buy it again.<br />
<br />
1 Million opens up with a scratchy orange-cinnamon mix, &amp; the cinnamon stays strong throughout the dry down. Honestly it's all I really pick up on, if anything I catch a bit of patchouli on the dry down to add a bit of freshness to the spices. <br />
For its price, it's great value. This bottle may last you years &amp; you need just a few sprays to last all night. My colleague wears this and I pick up on the scent throughout the day.<br />
<br />
As for the comments; I miss when Fragrantica had constructed reviews from fragrance enthusiasts. Bashing a scent and just calling it disgusting isn't helping anyone. I wanna hear why you don't like it. Maybe you're just upset because it's popular like Sauvage? (Don't even bother reading reviews on that one).<br />
<br />
For you, it may be a 9/10 if you started collecting, it has great longevity &amp; will grab attention.<br />
For me, it's a 6.8/10. I have grown tired of that orange cinnamon note but I understand why it is still popular.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2271113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2271113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269813" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="makakimoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2211724.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="makakimoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211724">makakimoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 02:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful citrus opening followed with a sweet and warm drydown i managed to pick up an older batch so the performance is excellent very pleased.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2269813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2269813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266978" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jetpack"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2230006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jetpack" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230006">Jetpack</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 Million by Paco Rabanne is a simple yet iconic fragrance for men, known for its sweet, classic appeal that makes it perfect for evening wear. Launched in 2008, this scent has become a staple in men's fragrance collections, celebrated for its distinctive blend of fresh, spicy, and warm notes.<br />
<br />
The fragrance opens with a fresh burst of blood mandarin, grapefruit, and mint, creating an energizing start. The heart adds a sweet and spicy combination of cinnamon and rose, giving the scent a warm, inviting quality. The base features leather, amber, and patchouli, providing a deep, rich finish that enhances its lasting power.<br />
<br />
Ideal for those who enjoy a sweet, classic scent, 1 Million is perfect for making a statement on a night out, offering a fragrance that is both modern and timeless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2266978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2266978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265447" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265447" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scent_of_sweden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1838042.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scent_of_sweden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trussardi/Riflesso-46287.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46287.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Riflesso"title="Riflesso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265447ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265447" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838042">scent_of_sweden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 23:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Face to face with a bubble gum chewing bear he couldnt remember what to do: lay down, scream or back the fuck off? Paralysed to the bone he stood still and the only thing moving was the jaw. It blew a bubble, and another one, a huge one. Paow!! I am warm and spicy! the bear sat down an started licking the fur. A talking bear was the only thing he didnt need right now, but thinking life would end in about ten seconds he might as well be truthful: Sorry, but to me you are nothing moore than amber in abundance. The bear clipped with his eyes: So you say, so you say! A huge blue bubble came out of his jaw, impressing as hell, but it got stuck in his fur, and he couldnt get it off. At a steady pace the bear lifted from the ground, first elevating, then a soft warm breeze took a hold of the balloon an swept the fury package away. Up in the sky and in to the night. Exhausted, but with his life saved, the man put air into his lungs and screamed: Youre nothing moore than amber, you hairy piece of shit, notning moore than amber! From a distanse he could here a small echo trickeling through the air: I am Paco Motherfocker!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2265447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2265447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amazing scent. Definitely not the most versatile of the 1 Million line but its still good nonetheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2260474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2260474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258585" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="matty08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="matty08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/John-Varvatos-XX-62838.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62838.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="John Varvatos XX"title="John Varvatos XX"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074603">matty08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very solid obviously mens fragrance its relatively cheap for the scent it starts with a pretty synthetic orangey cleaner smell with some sweetness then goes into full spicy amber. the bottle is very beautiful its really good highly recommend</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Elixir is meh, not really good but smelled much worse from the flankers. <br />

My top 3 from the line would be <br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243563" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yves1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2167884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yves1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243563ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243563" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); As I know it used to be a beast when it was first released in 2008 <br />
it still performs well it is just a milder scent now.<br />
when it comes to bottle design it is a love or hate thing.<br />
The only thing I wouldn't say I like about 1 Million is its popularity.<br />
When I smell it first thing that comes to my mind is winter evening when someone spends his evening in a cozy bar or a coffee shop with a classy outfit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Theonewhosmellsgoodaf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Theonewhosmellsgoodaf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215607">Theonewhosmellsgoodaf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 06:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to wear this a lot back in the days, and i loved it, but nowadays it smells like a chemical mess. Performance isnt good, and it hurts your nose with that overpowering grapefruit and overwhelming sweetness in the dry down. The flankers such as Elixir and Royal are much better, and are worth spending more money on. <br />
<br />
Scent: 5/10<br />
Versatility: 4/10<br />
Price: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 6/10<br />
<br />
Overall: 5.75/10, not my favourite. But if you love it, you love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2242626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2242626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Used my 50ml and never thought of buying another one. But the other day I got an amazing steal deal for $50 for 100ml and got it today. It smells amazing and unique today. I like it and will be wearing it a lot. It is definitely an 8/10 no less.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2238608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2238608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907719">fragking2504</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember smelling this after hearing loads of negative reviews by influencers online who say "it's overrated" or "over worn" and no surprise I hated it. However, a few months later I tried it again with a fresh mind and as a a young guy who wasn't around when this fragrance was huge it actually smells very unique as a men's warmer fragrance and is really lovely and different from everything out there right now. So id say if your a guy born after the year 2000 this is an amazing scent that you can pull off and I think it's one everyone should own, plus you can get it at a really good price today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
Most "mens winter fragrance" just smell like stronger with you by giorgio armani.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2227064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2227064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224620" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224620" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224620ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224620" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 15:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An iconic scent that started the modern fragrance trend. I can say that it is the ancestor of the colognes appreciated by Generation Z. Yes, you won't smell unique, but it's not as popular as it was 10 years ago. <br />
<br />
Maybe it's the fragrance whose opening I like the most. After about half an hour, it turns amber-ish. The cinnamon note is very well blended, you can never smell a pure cinnamon scent. Still sexy, still suitable for general taste.<br />
<br />
I used this perfume for the first time this year. I'm glad I'm this late. I really liked the bubblegum smell here and it felt quite familiar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2224620"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2224620#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222507" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="griffgraff11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="griffgraff11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198027">griffgraff11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 12:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has a bit of synthetic smell that can be a turn-off to some. I think it is a good fragrance to have in a collection but not to have as your only one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2222507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2222507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219442" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scroub"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1801914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scroub" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Bleu-Electrique-67997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu lectrique"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu lectrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801914">Scroub</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the very first fragrance that made me ask someone what they were wearing. It is a timeless scent. It is unapologetically BOLD. Rose, mandarin, cinammon, patchouli. It is not a typically masculine profile. And yet that only makes it devilishly seductive. It is bold, but elegant, and surprisingly fresh as well (because of the mint I guess). It does lean synthetic but the result is surprisingly convincing. A classic, that's what it is. Just don't spray too much, you don't need to. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2219442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2219442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218486" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218486" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EbagAppez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EbagAppez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-13857.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13857.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb"title="Spicebomb"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919507">EbagAppez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fall/winter/early spring evening reach for me. I like this fragrance, but I wouldn't say I love it. I'll wear it some evenings simply to change it up. <br />
<br />
When I do wear it, I am really happy with how it performs. Even after all of these years, it has not been immensely weakened due to reformulation. When I wear it out, I am getting no less than 8-10 hours. Thus is another one that hangs around faintly on my shirt the next morning when I'm putting it in the hamper. For an EDT this packs a punch!<br />
<br />
I'd say if you can pick up a 50ml for $45 like i did. It's worth throwing into your collection if you just need a dumb evening reach for the cold weather. It definitely has mass appealing sweet qualities to it that still play well in today's current market trends.<br />
<br />
I haven't worn this enough times to really expound more on the performance aspects, so I will make it a point to spray this one more during the upcoming winter months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2218486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2218486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210883" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="therainman2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2184096.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="therainman2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210883ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210883" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096">therainman2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First 1 hour is god tier fragrance level. I hate that this fragrace dries down to a mess, no way near as appealing or interesting as the opening hour. You get an amazing fresh citrus + spice bomb that is intoxicating, BUT this has been copied to death, so anyone over 25 has smelled this many times. It has decent performance, it can be cloying if oversprayed be carefull. I still prefer the Royal and Prive version, but OG is still decent.<br />
<br />
Smell : 7/10<br />
Performance : 7.5/10<br />
Price : 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2210883"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2210883#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204229" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mitsubishi lancer Evo X"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mitsubishi lancer Evo X" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566937">Mitsubishi lancer Evo X</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Greatest designer of all time.<br />
 It starts off with a freshness thats not present in any fragrance Ive ever smelt and its unreal. Then it dries down into this amazing classy cinnamon scent. I cant think of any designer that beats this in terms of pure smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2204229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2204229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202765" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="advil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040712"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2040712.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="advil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Hawas-Ice-for-Him-89050.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89050.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hawas Ice for Him"title="Hawas Ice for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202765ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202765" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040712">advil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-29">06/29/24 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>yall can say its oversaturated if you want, my dad gifted me his old bottle and it smells amazing its pretty sweet with a decent amount of cinnamon kinda spice in there and even though its an edt it projects really well and has great longevity. atomizer as long as you press it firmly is great and sprays a ton. smells like an fall evening in a bottle. the opening is pretty citrusy but not in a freshie kinda way, and the drydown maintains some of that, but adds a little spice and sweetness to it. overall amazing fragrance. if you can find it i would honestly recommend it if you're looking for a citrusy warm sweet cinamonny kinda fragrance. just dont wear it in the heat or it smells pretty repulsive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2202765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2202765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RiddleHorse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2168716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RiddleHorse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168716">RiddleHorse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Say whatever you want to say about One Million, my most bought cologne ever. The opening, the mid, the dry down, the journey this scent takes you is just MAGNIFICENT. It is the true incarnation of the word VERSATILITY. In winter you smell spices mainly cinnamon, in spring  you get rose and faint leather, in autumn you are introduced to patchouli and woods, in summer you live with the dancing tones of amber and roses. There is something MAGICAL about this scent I do not have the words to describe.  A truly Master Piece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2200128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2200128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199985" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julienlikesfragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169064"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julienlikesfragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199985ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199985" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169064">Julienlikesfragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 08:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing. The cinnamon stands out the most here, but everything else blends in with it very well. Its a sweet cinnamon scent that has touches of leather and wood to add masculinity. Its performs very well. It lasted 9 hours on my skin and it projects really well. Id only wear in cold weather because it will become too powerful and will smell almost sickening in heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2199985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2199985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184157" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 15:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally got to really rest this out outside of department store tester strips and hand sprays . First thing, this is strong. I learned quick that 3 sprays is more than enough.  I like that it does its own thing. I really is spicy and amber, warm has a touch of floral to round things out, animalic. I can see why a lot of people like it. But it's just not for me. I dig it a little bit but once it all mixes in with that animalic smell with the Indian patchouli it kills it for me. It almost smells like warm cinnamon and rose dog hair . That with the strength makes me a little nauseous .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2184157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2184157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
