align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2183608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2183608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180848" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180848" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethan-fragrantica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethan-fragrantica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180848ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180848" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1673973">ethan-fragrantica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One Million by Paco Rabanne: <br />
Warm cinnamon amber scent. It doesn't blow me away but it does do its own thing. Somewhat overworn and the bottle design isn't really my taste but it definitely stands out. That's the whole idea with this scent, it's nothing crazy but you know straight away by smell and appearance what it is and that can be good or bad. Personally I don't mind it. Obviously more suited to younger guys and colder months but maybe consider going for one of the flankers instead.<br />
<br />
Top notes: Orange, grapefruit, chocolate<br />
Middle notes: Cinnamon, spices, amber<br />
Base notes: Amber, patchouli, woods, leather<br />
<br />
Longevity: 4.5/5<br />
Sillage: 4/5<br />
Scent: 3.5/5<br />
Design: 2/5<br />
Gender: Masculine<br />
Overall: 3/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2180848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2180848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180585" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miguelanski"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2098029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2098029.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miguelanski" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-2018-50239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombr Leather (2018)"title="Ombr Leather (2018)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2098029">Miguelanski</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have the OG version before the reformulation and becoming slightly fresher. Let's get straight to the point. It's an Amazing sweet legendary smell! The only reason this fragrance gets hate is because of how popular and overused it's become. When it comes to the smell itself there is nothing to hate about. You're not going to stand out but you're guaranteed to smell amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2180585"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2180585#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marxwick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marxwick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083">Marxwick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 02:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy the bright opening of sweet, rose, and ambery spices before the woody leather base becomes more prominent in the far dry down.<br />
Comparing my 2012 and 2021 bottles, the newer batch is a fresher and lighter version of the OG DNA.<br />
However, my 2012 no longer has that bright citrus mint opening, but is heavy with the base notes of cinnamon, amber, and leather. Its performance still trumps the 2021 batch, which has moderate projection and longevity. <br />
It is still one to try in the rite of passage of the perfume history.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2179718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2179718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sebastiansmellsgood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sebastiansmellsgood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008007">sebastiansmellsgood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 14:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a very overhated fragrance by people nowadays for it being popular and being overused in the early 2010s and late 2000s. It has a very nice citrus opening into the warm cinnamon spicy dry down with great performance. My main issue is how easily cloying the fragrance can be with just a little too much causing crazy headaches. Price (7/10) Performance (9/10) smell (8/10)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2179221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2179221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176081" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HBeez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1983639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HBeez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983639">HBeez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 17:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Legendary cologne that holds a special place for me. <br />
<br />
Bought a bottle in 2011 when I was in highschool. I didn't know much about fragrances, and I guess I had poor fragrance etiquette. I would use 4-5 sprays, and this was back when fragrances had decent performance, when 1 million was even more concentrated (keep in mind current batches still have really good performance). Whether any of my classmates learned math, chem, or physics depended on the effort they put into their education, but there was absolutely no question they all left those classes knowing what 1 million smells like.<br />
<br />
Objectively, this is a pleasant fragrance that in my opinion had a great impact on changing fragrance trends. Not to mention it had the coolest ad I've seen (2008 ad). It's been a massive success and at this point most people have had it or smelled it on others. So I guess it's over played. It is also really sweet and spicy, especially in the opening. Its flankers are more modern and less sweet, so they might be a better alternative.<br />
<br />
Nonetheless, I feel like it gets a bit too much hate. Regardless of people think of it today, the legend of OG 1 million will live on forever and no one can take anything away from how it changed the fragrance market.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2176081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2176081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173390" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ziggy58"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ziggy58" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068565">Ziggy58</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Loved this scent for the first month that I had it then I didn't like it anymore. Still has that warm and comforting feeling when wearing it though. Performance is pretty good. I don't think this is a mass appealing scent. 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2173390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2173390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cabooter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2089916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cabooter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916">Cabooter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yo, peeps be hatin' on one million like it's skibidi gyatt rizz only in Ohio! But hold up, let's talk facts. This fragrance ain't just for the gooners, nah, it's the OG of that sweet and sexy clubbing scent trend, you feel me?<br />
<br />
And don't even get me started on the performance! This juice lasts longer than a Duke Dennis livestream, even outlasting some niche ouds. It's like, when you spray 1 Million, you're literally hitting the griddy the ocky way, making you feel like you're living in the backrooms with gigachad vibes, you feel me? This scent's got the gooning grindset to make you feel like you're goated with the sauce, like you're the king of the gaming world.<br />
<br />
And reformulation yapping? Straight-up goofy ahh. The new batches still bussin, lasting a solid 14 hours plus on my skin, no edging in class. No nut November? Nah, it's all about poknut November when you're rocking 1 Million, straight up foot fetish vibes in the chat. And let's not forget, this scent's so powerful it's like I'm t-posing on all them other frags, asserting my dominance like a true alpha.<br />
<br />
Nowadays, it might not be as hyped, but that's a blessing in disguise. You cop it now, and you're rizzmaxxing. Plus, half these folks out here still don't know what they're missing.<br />
<br />
And let's not forget Jeremy Fragrance  dude needs to take a chill pill and hit the goon cave. Smurf cat, strawberry elephant  all of 'em know what's up. It's time to vibe with the scent, leave the hate in the backrooms. Peace out, ya'll, grinding it out, literally hitting the griddy the ocky way! Keep gooning, stay sus, and remember to sigma up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2172861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2172861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171775" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171775" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlexandrNechiporenko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2092419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlexandrNechiporenko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171775ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171775" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2092419">AlexandrNechiporenko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this scent. I didnt feel it cloyingly sweet, as many people write. At the beginning there is an explosion of spices, very powerful. Then you feel the skin with a note of rose. By the end of the day I could feel the patchouli. The longevity is enormous. Overall, this scent did not endear me , but also hatred. Many girls like it. But I wouldnt recommend applying more than two sprays, it can cause migraines and nausea. Just for the same money, its better to take D&amp;G The One EDP. Girls also like it and its much easier to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2171775"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2171775#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170354" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blindbuyer419"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="blindbuyer419" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3747.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million"title="1 Million"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947171">blindbuyer419</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very strong projection with no longevity, opening is harsh and chemically and somewhat offensive. only detectable notes in the drydown are spices. eugh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2170354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2170354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suicidal_wizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suicidal_wizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610786">Suicidal_wizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 02:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Revolting stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160883" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rham_scents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876139"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rham_scents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160883ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160883" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876139">rham_scents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-19">05/19/24 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will never forget the OG batch of this stuff<br />
It was SO good.. the reformulated batch isn't so good and that's what threw me off this scent tbh. <br />
I smelt it on a friend a few months ago and I got a headache.. the new batch is too intoxicating to a point where it doesn't smell nice anymore<br />
I don't recommend this one, but if you can get your hands on an earlier batch then go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2160883"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2160883#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160772" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Unmodernize"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.948972.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Unmodernize" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Baldessarini-Black-56762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baldessarini Black"title="Baldessarini Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972">Unmodernize</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-19">05/19/24 02:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Revisited a sample in 2024 and stricken by how much Le Male DNA is in here.<br />
<br />
Smells to me like a summer Le Male from the 90s, or the classic Le Terrible comes to mind too.<br />
<br />
Its fresh but with a hefty body underneath, tropical sweet. I used to think it had atoo busy and offensive profile but smelling it now it is actually less abbrasive than modern releases. <br />
<br />
It is a very nice fragrance, pre Ambergris Bleu wave. <br />
<br />
Love it, especially for summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2160772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2160772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158989" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158989" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luilind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1805463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luilind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Note-Vanillee-Nectar-78628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Note Vanille Nectar"title="Note Vanille Nectar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158989ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158989" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805463">Luilind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 07:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a blast of generic male fragrance, quite overpowering and not really pleasant.<br />
<br />
After 30 minutes it settles as a somewhat powdery cinnamon-minty scent that is a little synthethic at first, but after an hour or so actually becomes quite nice. And this nice cinna-mint scent lasts a long time. Its sweet and therefore best for autumn/winter - without the sweetness it wouldve been really good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2158989"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2158989#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; but back in 2008, I tested it at the mall and it instantly gave me nauseat<br />
the most disgusting scent ever..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2158779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2158779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sodapony"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1806097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1806097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sodapony" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Shock-For-Him-12520.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12520.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Shock For Him"title="CK One Shock For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1806097">sodapony</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Packaging: gimmicky and embarrassing gold bar with a kind of annoying atomizer.  Would not want to leave this on my dresser or counter top.  2/10<br />
Opening: powerful, sickly sweet.  There are animalic and spicy notes, but the sweetness overwhelms all.  Cloying and synthetic in the extreme. 2/10<br />
Dry down: Linear progression of the opening. No changes. 2/10<br />
Longevity: Will last all day and into the next day. The smell will permeate all of your personal effects, and will linger wherever you've been.  Eternal performance. 10/10<br />
Sillage:  Brutally enormous sillage that will radiate off you so powerfully that you'll swear you can see it.  A cloying sweetness will fill a room, a car, a bus, a plane, a plane hangar, and the average stadium or concert hall. 10/10<br />
Value:  If you enjoy its scent, it's a good value proposition as it is affordable and has truly epic performance and beastly sillage. 8/10<br />
Use cases: Night clubs and date nights, at night ONLY.  Not an office fragrance.I don't think it should be worn in warm weather, as its already nuclear performance would get even more overwhelming.<br />
Overall:  A cloying sweetness that assaults all those who have encounter it, 1 Million is a weapons-grade fragrance.  1 Million is a very common/popular fragrance that performs amazingly but has a polarizing smell. 3/10 (not an average)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2156721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2156721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142230" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samuelares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samuelares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men"title="A*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142230ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142230" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); Too sweet at the opening and I immediately tried washing it off. <br />
<br />
5.5/10 - I can see how people like this but not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2142230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2142230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141916" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SpiderSlatt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SpiderSlatt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016807">SpiderSlatt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 03:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>2093 Twizzy said it best. It's just boring. Will you get compliments? Probably. Performance? Outstanding. In fact, if this is your first time on this site and don't have a bunch of colognes then you should buy it. But I'm starting to have a villain arc &amp; may be turning into a fragrance snob by saying this, but it's just 1 dimensional and might i say, **NPC**. If you want something interesting and don't want to smell like a teenager I wouldn't get this. 1 Mil Royal really impressed me though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138518" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chronosnow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094203.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chronosnow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094203">Chronosnow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 18:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly smells like Jean Paul Gaultier le male. My friend wore it and I couldnt tell if he was wearing 1 million or le male lol. 8/10 fragrance. Definitely costs what its worth. Even though it doesn't smell as good as some other 1 millions it is still really good for its value.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2138518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2138518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138029" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SiddhantSuryawanshi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1690312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SiddhantSuryawanshi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138029ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138029" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1690312">SiddhantSuryawanshi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The gaudy gold packaging alone is enough to make one raise an eyebrow. I suppose they intend for it to project luxury, wealth, and power; rather unsubtle, in my view. The scent itself follows this garish theme.<br />
<br />
It opens with a jarring blast of citrus, like a fruit vendor over-zealously assaulting your nostrils. This gives way to a muddled heart of rose and spice notes, cloyingly sweet with an undercurrent of something vaguely metallic. The base is a rather predictable mix of wood and leather, providing little solace from the earlier assault.<br />
<br />
Honestly, the overall effect is comparable to a nouveau riche American crashing a dinner at Buckingham Palace; loud, out of place, and overly eager to impress. While a young chap might be tempted by its brashness, 1 Million lacks the subtlety and refinement a true gentleman requires. <br />
<br />
Instead, may I suggest seeking out The Most Wanted by Azzaro? It's new on the scene as well, but possesses a far more interesting character. Notes of quiet confidence and a smoldering intensity far more enticing than mere flashiness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2138029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2138029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137457" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="person of colorado"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="person of colorado" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818967">person of colorado</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 16:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had a blast reading all the negs,<br />
<br />
these reviews are telling!!!!!<br />
<br />
 this sub doens't need any more reviews so here is a story:<br />
<br />
at first I thought that my skin chemistry and the paco rabannes go together like bread and butter, all of them. I only spritzed a tiny mosquito amount from a tiny tester vial onto my pulse hot spots and it lasted all day long... but then I found out it was not my skin but paco rabanne being too powerful.<br />
<br />
recently someone I know wanted to get rid of his unwanted purchases, surprise surprise he offered his 200 ML container 1 million and another royal. I couldn't take it even if was only for a fiver, this is so much I would never finish a tenth in five years, considering it is so strong.<br />
<br />
guys, there is so much to enjoy and to explore, do you all really want the same Versace Eros and Hugo Boss the Scent, there are so many great lines and types and brands and niche perfumes out there to discover, this just screams "yes this is good, look no further in life, buy me now, forever!!"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2137457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2137457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2136756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2136756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RajahSaheb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1126129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1126129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RajahSaheb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-Grey-50611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One Grey"title="The One Grey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2136756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2136756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104656">brokenosey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 08:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I was about 13 years old, I was wandering around a store with my mother, so I went to the perfume section and tried a few perfumes, but one of them caught my nose, Paco Rabanne 1 Million. I fell in love at that moment. Even though it is a scent beyond my age, I have loved this scent ever since, no matter what anyone says, this is the scent of all times. It is one of the best scents, but even though its longevity has decreased in recent years but its okay still a masterpiece for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129221" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NogelBogel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2059991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NogelBogel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2059991">NogelBogel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had this fragrance for my signature fragrance for the whole winter, and I have gotten alot of response. The main response from the cold winter days out in the wind and snow, people love it. Or, at least no complaints. Very very sweet honey like fragrance. The second you go inside though, people start getting headaches. If the same people are around you the whole day, or just more than an hour, they get sick of it, even if they liked it to start out with. The silliage is really loud and aggressive, but the longevity is quite mid. 5/10 fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2129221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2129221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jackw9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jackw9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Grand-Soir-40816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grand Soir"title="Grand Soir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036035">Jackw9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this one just does not smell good. I usually love the cinnamonny and warm scents, but theres something in this one thats just really off putting. I can see why some might like it and the nostolgia behind it, but it smells pretty bad to me. 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2128838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2128838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; a perfect 5/10, don't recommend</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2121531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2121531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 09:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 Million is just one of those fragrances where I genuinely cannot comprehend how people can find it enjoyable. Its simply just one of the worst smelling fragrances on the mass market at the moment, and yet its a cultural icon - most likely due to its gaudy and identifiable bottle.<br />
<br />
Overall this scent is a synthetic mess of warm spices and citric mandarin. This results in a scent that is trying to be both warm and fresh, but fails miserably. Instead, the final product is just a barrage of intense sharpness - assaulting the nostrils unforgivingly.<br />
<br />
I genuinely believe this is an awful, awful fragrance. I dislike it intensely, but that is the case with pretty much everything from Paco Rabanne if Im honest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2121414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2121414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I buy it year after year after year. I am 19 now, and I still receive compliments about it. Even got a compliment by my teacher, who walked past me in class. Yes, it's a classic, but who cares. It is so overpopulated for a good freason. Rose and cinnamon combi, I LOVE IT! <br />
Longevity is 9/10. 4 sprays on the neck and shirt (2 each), and it'll easily sit there for 6+ hours<br />
<br />
If you still haven't bought it yet, BUY IT! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2120628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2120628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smacleod7117"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034406"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smacleod7117" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034406">smacleod7117</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yea its overdone and on the TikTok influencer train now but I dont care. Its a classic. I have a soft spot for it because my younger brother got a dupe one year for Christmas and I thought it was the best smelling cologne at the time. <br />
<br />
I think unfortunately its probably a little too night on the town for office wear or day to day but every now and then it just feels right. Luxurious, spicy, sexy-theres nothing not to like about the fragrance itself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2110063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2110063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107466" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wondervalley666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wondervalley666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salum-Parfums/Cocoyster-90755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cocoyster"title="Cocoyster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605">wondervalley666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a sample of this, though Im a woman in her 30s and probably not the target demographic. I sprayed a few spritzes on my wrist and was surprised at how much this smells like Lady Million! I had a bottle of that perfume awhile back. On my skin, this smells like Lady Million, but with a sort of piney opening ( I guess its the mint + woods), which fades after a few minutes. After that, this kind of feels like lady million, fruity with a sort of ISO super pencil shaving style woody molecule note.  Surprisingly, this fragrance fades really fast on my skin. It only lasts about an hour, two max. Lady million lasted an eternity on me so Im not sure why this is so much shorter-lived, unless they were reformulated. <br />
<br />
The listed notes dont make much sense to me. The Lady Million notes never made sense to me either. These two smell so much alike despite only having patchouli in common. For those complaining about the performance, try sampling Lady Million. Layer it with a piney wood scent. <br />
<br />
For everyone saying this scent is old news, too young, or played out, its 2024 and I just smelled it for the first time today. I only smelled Lady Million for the first time a couple years ago. Ive never smelled a man wearing this or anything like it, so maybe youre just stuck in small social circles where everyones tastes are too similar. Or maybe I never smelled it because it doesnt last very long. <br />
<br />
..Shrug..<br />
<br />
Its nice though, for what its worth!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2107466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2107466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I cant help but love the smell of this stuff, I dont own it and never have but it reminds me of my early teenage years and the friends I made back then. Its very nostalgic to me but I refuse to buy a full bottle of it because it does not stay on my skin, if anyone knows any niche fragrances that accomplish this DNA and more, please let me know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
