padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100304" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Onlineturk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005098"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005098.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Onlineturk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-9099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel"title="Bleu de Chanel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005098">Onlineturk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 01:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When i first wore this in 2009 it was gorgeous, it was pungent, sillage was great, i loved it then. But now it became a dupe of its former self, i think it does not deserve its price tag anymore. Better go with The Golden Secret Antonio Banderas, at least it is cheaper!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2100304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2100304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100252" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SenselessReviews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SenselessReviews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154">SenselessReviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 23:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An ambitious attempt to interpret Peter Dinklage's orgasm as a fragrance, "1 Million" delivers.<br />
<br />
With its overt sweetness, "1 Million" has our nostrils vibrating like Mr. Miyagi at a Japanese burlesque show. Compliments pour out of your girlfriend's mouth like the brown waterfall formed when Chunk from "The Goonies" vomits chocolate milk. Come drydown, you are an oily Carl Weathers jumping around in a stars-and-stripes top hat mere moments before your death. <br />
<br />
"1 Million" is perhaps the best promoted cologne of a generation. Kudos to the marketing department for those glossy magazine ads with a nude Jeff Goldblum seductively slurping the bottle. In a forest of flankers, it is easy to forget the underrated charisma of the OG. <br />
<br />
Manliness Ranking: Justin Bieber gluing on artificial chest hair</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2100252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2100252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lemosse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987266"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987266.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lemosse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); <br />
Both of them are absolutely horrible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2097724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2097724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097536" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vikingtop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1583172.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vikingtop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Fougere-Royale-2010-10891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fougere Royale (2010)"title="Fougere Royale (2010)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583172">Vikingtop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rather fascinating scent.... for me it is very unisex.<br />
<br />
smells in the opening bubblegum.....warm fruits<br />
<br />
In the middle flowery....amber...spices and extreeeeemly sweet<br />
<br />
In the end cinnamon flowers....and a little wood<br />
<br />
<br />
It smells cheap, but not bad... :-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2097536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2097536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095442" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Robert Peck1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061160"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2061160.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Robert Peck1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/9pm-65414.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65414.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="9pm"title="9pm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061160">Robert Peck1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>1 Million is a sweet, warm, amber, bubblegum fragrance, although it is very popular and synthetic. But it's still a great classic fragrance.<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2095442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2095442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847839">eaumondieu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>love at first sniff. but then overtime, it gets a little bit boring and my collection grew a lot very quickly. i havent been able to use this very often since the collection grew, but this is still a very likeable perfume. there's a reason everyone wears this and that is because it smells really good. although here in my country, we dont have cold seasons so this is not a common perfume here</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2088007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2088007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mage4Zelda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997529"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997529.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mage4Zelda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997529">Mage4Zelda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A "candid" (pardon the pun), hearty and adventurous representation of oranges, grapefruits and florals. Long lasting, youthful, wholesome, cozy and a strong, powerful and signature Paco Robanne fragrance. <br />
<br />
One Million EDT has been in my arsenal since it was first released. It opens up with a cotton candy reveal but to the nose of a perfume connoisseur, its the sweet tanginess and fizziness of oranges/ grapefruits sparkling juice blended with rose and cinnamon. The top notes are quick to transform into a warm, salted form of oranges still retaining a bit of sweetness. The phase switch from top to middle notes is marvellous in the sense that it opens up in a similar fashion as one attempts to decipher their sense of smell and taste from the time they peel an orange with a spray of sweet and tangy citrus, to the first touch of the sour slice on tongue to the tangy, juicy residue left on the last gulp. This fragrance retains its middle notes to the very end, for 8+ hours on skin, and a few days on fabric, leaving a trail of notes with tell tale signs of Paco Robanne and a bit of leather, for those that are familiar with the line. <br />
<br />
For many, One Million is a delightful, warm, bright and vibrant bonbon that you would expect to find in Willy Wonka's factory. However, to an expert nose this fragrance ingeniously consists of long lasting, flavourful and hearty notes of oranges and grapefruits, with the warmth and sweetness of cinnamon, leather and amber. Its cheerful, charming, sugary goodness, and a classic paco robanne all the way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2081959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2081959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081841" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081841" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stefouuu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2043654.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stefouuu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081841ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081841" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043654">Stefouuu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 09:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the opening of this one, timeless as scents go. Sprayed myself a couple times and went out to the nearest shop, as soon as I entered the cashiers head turned towards me and I was immediately asked what perfume I was wearing, because when I entered an amazing smell entered as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2081841"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2081841#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081232" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rozzox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981840"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rozzox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-In-Roma-Yellow-Dream-64614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"title="Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Yellow Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078380" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Boxing Wiz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1006387"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Boxing Wiz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Lafayette-Street-51742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lafayette Street"title="Lafayette Street"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); If anyone has anything they want to trade for one of these, hit me up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2078380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2078380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077792" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hldmyhnd7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2035673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hldmyhnd7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2035673">hldmyhnd7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrus and cinnamon combos NEVER disappoint. Although this is a male scent, I've used it consistently in the summer and I feel like if used on warm skin, it gives a feminine scent. I'm probably wrong about that because, to be fair, I have no idea what the scientific explanation would be for that... but I've only used it in the warmer seasons, and it's been amazing for me. Also, the longevity of this perfume is phenomenal, and I understand that people don't like the sweetness of it and I think that proves my point about the feminity of it. It seems like this scent gets a lot of hate because its "overused", but I have to disagree strongly because its a good price, and a phenomenal scent, so you're smart for buying this especially if you want to explore different fragrances without blowing any budgets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2077792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2077792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="exmin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1980966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="exmin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rammstein/Engel-Pure-77244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Engel Pure"title="Engel Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1980966">exmin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance is perfectly balanced idk why it gets so much hate on here</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2077724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2077724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074967" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LePianoMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LePianoMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Mandorlo-di-Sicilia-1688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Mandorlo di Sicilia"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Mandorlo di Sicilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074967ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074967" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923250">LePianoMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me start this off by saying that 1 Million EDT is STILL a great perfume. People these days are more concerned with standing out than just wearing what they like, and that goes for more than just perfumery- you see this snobbery in shoes, clothing, watches, even tattoos and hair. I loved 1 million the first time I smelled it at 16 and I still love it at 22, although my tastes have developed to include things like Gucci Guilty Absolute, Tom Fords Black Orchid, and Dior Homme 2020. Its okay to like something thats popular, Ive never actually smelled 1 million on anyone else in public, neither have I smelled sauvage on anyone in public. Perfume is not as widely used as people here and on Reddit would have you believe.<br />
<br />
On to the actual perfume- still amazing, still beautiful. Opens up so nice and warm with a very pleasant sweetness. Spices join in almost immediately, led strongly by cinnamon. My amateur nose does not detect any citrus in this whatsoever, and I doubt the average person is gonna notice anything other than sweet and cinnamon from this and thats great, IMO.<br />
<br />
As it dries down into the heart, it gets spicier and the sweetness remains but just blends so beautifully with that spiciness. Once it dries down fully, I dont really get a lot of leather and wood from this either. In my opinion, at least off my skin, 1 million is a pretty linear perfume. Its like spraying yourself with a warm Cinnabon! Delicious smelling for sure and still very pleasant.<br />
<br />
Sure, its not groundbreaking- and for those complaining that it doesnt have enough naturals, look at the price point. For what you get, its downright cheap. People just have unrealistic expectations, which seems to be a pretty common trend in this $50-100 range for some reason.<br />
<br />
TL:DR- still stands its ground in 2024, still very mass appealing and pleasant to the nose, very inoffensive, sweet and cinnamony. Definitely catered to a younger demographic but you could absolutely wear this at any age- although thats how I feel about basically any perfume. If you like it, buy it- dont let the snobs keep you away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2074967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2074967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0lympian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1968071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1968071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="0lympian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guy-Laroche/Fidji-Eau-de-Toilette-2068.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2068.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fidji Eau de Toilette"title="Fidji Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1968071">0lympian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 21:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I GENUINELY enjoy 1 million even though its really trendy. I love how LOUD it is man it just smacks me in the damn face every time. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058037" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wizzie08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1984988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wizzie08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/The-Kingdom-97995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Kingdom"title="The Kingdom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984988">Wizzie08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet &amp; luxurious smelling hence the name one million. It makes you feel like you have a million bucks. My most complimented, best performing, beast mode!<br />
<br />
It is popular hence hated by frag community but it's currently my date night fragrance cause my wife loves it .. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2058037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2058037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rebeccathomas911"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882859"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rebeccathomas911" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882859">rebeccathomas911</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 07:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance used to be nuclear and lasted on guys I was with for days. Today I got my nose to it again for the first time in a while and after just an hour, it's so faintly barely just around. Also, my brother got a bottle for Christmas 2023 and confirmed the very same thing: projection is abysmal and NOTHING like it used to be in overall performance, not even close.<br />
<br />
Disliking a fragrance because the greedy production manufacturers (in this case, Paco Rabanne) have watered/weakened/cut costs and delivered a substandard product compared to what it once was is absolutely a genuine reason to give a thumbs down. <br />
<br />
If this were still 2008, or 2010, I'd give this fragrance a love vote and it would be a must-buy. But now, with the MASSIVELY weakened reformulations, this is a shadow of what it used to be and I don't recommend it to anyone. You still get the same scent as the original, but it performs to maybe 10% of the ability of the first years of 1 Million, so don't waste your money on this watered-down junk (which costs MORE now than at its original release!). Instead, I would recommend exploring its closest clones and either get cheaper ones like Cuba Paris Cuba Royal which gives the same level of performance as 1 Million has for a while, or spend a little bit more for a better-performing one like Armaf Club de Nuit Man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2057095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2057095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HermanoBasura"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HermanoBasura" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Parfum-50757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Parfum"title="Y Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002728">HermanoBasura</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance, and it is the highlight of my collection. People may say that it's from your teenage years and to leave it there, but personally I love it. The opening is warm, spicy, citrus and very fruity. On me lasts around 7+ hours. But the only downside for me is that around 1 - 2 hours after putting on, it loses its silage quite a lot. I would totally recommend this for anyone who is in to warm and spicy, tropical fruit and orange type of smells. Would recommend for parties and the colder months. 10/10 (for me) I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2052788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2052788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052006" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deliza1997"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deliza1997" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874663">Deliza1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells great. I don't find anything wrong with it. Fresh, juicy, citrusy opening and warm, sweet, spicy, floral, woody  on the dry down. Some may say It's very juvenile for men but this makes it a good unisex fragrance. It is really suitable for boys and men in their early 20s; plus women can also try this just to bring a change.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2052006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2052006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amber sweet, rosy floral, with spices and wood. Little patchouli powder in the dry down. Smooth spices and sweetness, warm woody, sexy. Projects moderately. Sticks to fabrics. Very nice toilette!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2041140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2041140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; it's classic. Mass appeal, more masculine but definitely could pass as unisex.<br />
<br />
I'm layering this with Banana Republic's Tonka Bean &amp; Vanilla fragrance, and it's really nice!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2039335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2039335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037402" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tomgre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1524121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tomgre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); I think it's from 2009. It's still good, and I use it for night occasions (e.g., chilled at the bar, night out, dinner, etc.). Outstanding performance, eternal longevity on me, and good projection.<br />
This perfume introduced me to other Paco Rabanne; I still give this 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2037402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2037402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; As the top evaporates your left with a warm sweet cinnamon. Stays warm until the end with amber and a hint woody scent. Very powerful sexy scent. I love how this is a fluid fragrance that changes over the course of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2036030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2036030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I decided to just wear it finally and people asked me what my fragrance was, because I smelled so delicious. My GF loves it on me. I love it too. Period. <br />
Sweet, spicy, juicy, just fun. Would I wear this to a business lunch? Definitely not. But for having fun at a bar/club, a day shopping etc: it's great! <br />
This is popular for a reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2035303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2035303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
