As soon as you smell this scent in the wild you know - that's 1 Million. Awesome performance, great scent, reasonable price. Hated by hipsters who love to hate on popular things just because they're popular. News flash: they are popular for a reason!<br />
<br />
Solid 8.0/10 from me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2026350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2026350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025315" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 06:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasant universal male scent with warm woody base and nice sweet&amp;spicy undertones. I think it might be worn by women too, because it smells fairly unisex. Good frag for its price <br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2025315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2025315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025274" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Defindo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1698618.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Defindo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Intensely-52802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025274ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025274" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698618">Defindo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I was first getting into fragrances this was one of the first I bought. Which, I bet, a lot of other people did when starting off too. However, over time you get told "1 Million is overused" "1 Million is reformulated" "Get this flanker instead!" Well, even after collecting so many fragrances I still enjoy using 1 Million in the colder weather, I've never once had somebody say anything negative to me in person about it either. The honest truth is, yes this fragrance WAS overly popular but it really isn't anymore. I haven't smelled anybody else wear this in at least a year now.<br />
<br />
The take-away from this is; this is a good fragrance. It smells really good and has a carefree clubbing feel to it, if your concern was as mentioned previously, you have nothing to worry about. If you want it, get it, I'd say the only "negative" to this scent is the price, which can be a little too high for it's uses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2025274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2025274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022698" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TipTopNotes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TipTopNotes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538832">TipTopNotes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the opening, I'm met with a blast of bright, spicy orange and cool mint. I don't pick the mint out specifically but it gives the citrus opening this  vague brisk quality. All of this swiftly settles down in line with the thicker, fluffier notes of rose and leather, which round everything out. It becomes this very smooth, slightly-fruity bubblegum-like scent in the big-picture. It's well-blended and only occasionally do the citruses pop through from time to time giving off bursts of brightness before returning to sizzle softly in the background. In addition, the rose fades in and out of the frame, and creates a secondary big-picture of scent: a musky flower drizzled in a warm, ambery honey. My mind switches back and forth between these two images. 1 Million offers fruitiness, florals, and warm spices in a very delicate balance.<br />
<br />
It performs admirably, despite other's mentioning reformulations. I haven't tried it closer to its original release but a recent decant of it lasts well into an 8-hour work day, and still remains as a soft scent afterwards. It's projection is somewhat loud, even with just 3 sprays of a travel-size sprayer. It caught the attention of a couple coworkers, and my workplace isn't an office or any other cramped workspace.<br />
<br />
The only caveat I can think of is that it does smell a bit more ubiquitous than many other scents I've encountered in the real world. People say everyone wears Sauvage, but of the 4 times I've smelled someone's fragrance in the last year and immediately recognized the scent, 3 of those times were unquestionably 1 Million EDT. Not a big deal, I'm not obsessed with smelling as unique as humanly possible. However, some of the newer flankers, like Elixir, Lucky, and even parfum, smell a bit more distinctive and even modern as a whole. This feeling may partially stem from the popularity of 1 Million EDT and how some cheap scented products--particularly public bathroom soaps and/or urinal cakes-- have tried to replicate this smell. Regardless, the real thing is multiple steps above those knockoffs, and any resemblance to those cheap products dissolve when you stop huffing the atomizer and actually let this wonderful juice radiate off your skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2022698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2022698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022195" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Featherblossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Featherblossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364">Featherblossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 05:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this as a sample and was reluctant to try it as it is marketed for men.<br />
I was surprsed to find that it's much more of a unisex scent! On me, it's a lovely spicy, cinnamon rose.<br />
<br />
The opening is a bright, sharp blood orange that quickly turns spicy as the cinnamon comes out more. As the drydown develops, the rose turns it almost lipsticky. I guess a man could wear this but I think it's probably nicer on a woman!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2022195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2022195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022137" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CHRISTIANDIORDIOR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CHRISTIANDIORDIOR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022137ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022137" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930654">CHRISTIANDIORDIOR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What's all the hate for? You can say this is too common, that there are better fragrances in the line, whatever. But I don't think someone can honestly smell this and say it's a 2/5. It's such a good blend for a cologne, one of the few that I would say works year round, and it's sweet and spicy and fruity, without any of those being too dominant. The fruity opening is one of my favorites of all time.<br />
<br />
Projection is excellent, longevity too.<br />
<br />
It's sad because this used to be such a unique fragrance, and is now considered common. Destroyed by its own success, I guess.<br />
<br />
Oh, and I love the bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2022137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2022137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Oudgasm-Cafe-Oud-19-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-85187.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85187.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oudgasm Caf Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Oudgasm Caf Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 00:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It really is a nice worthwhile scent but unless I can get it on the cheaper side I wont pay more than 30-40 these days. I probably would have previously but thats when this was groundbreaking to me. Ive smelled many similar and better perfumes since but having said that I cannot fault this. It really is a worthy fragrance if you can get it when its on offer. A beautiful fragrance that was previously probably one of the best but I think its long since been surpassed. I still recommend it but not for 50 or more. None offensive but standout. Suitable for work and leisure. Not too formal but not at all obnoxious. A safe scent that will generally generate interest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2020844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2020844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019464" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019464ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019464" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960">lidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It still smells great and if it has a good price it is a great buy ,especially since it is less common today.<br />
<br />
Scent:8<br />
Projection/Longevity:7<br />
Uniqueness:6<br />
quality:8<br />
Value for money:ok<br />
<br />
Overall:7.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2019464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2019464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ILMIBEGOLLI"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952038"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1952038.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ILMIBEGOLLI" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952038">ILMIBEGOLLI</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shum pidha i kom qi me kit parfim</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="2016342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=2016342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="3747" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1908739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908739" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BrianFantana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1440870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BrianFantana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440870">BrianFantana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 12:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has always been great. People bitched about it being too strong and "sickly sweet" for years, but now those same guys are wearing Stronger With You Intensely, Angel's Share, and all of the Elixirs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="1908739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=1908739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent577154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc577154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spray_and_pray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/854936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.854936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spray_and_pray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/Every-Storm-a-Serenade-34470.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34470.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Every Storm a Serenade"title="Every Storm a Serenade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma577154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd577154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/854936">spray_and_pray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-03-15">03/15/15 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't like to go on "fragrance fueled" rants but I can't hold my tongue any longer. I'm sure i'll catch some negative feedback for this but here goes:<br />
<br />
The reviews here trashing 1 Million are insane. Just because tons of people rock this doesn't make it unworthy. That's the tell tale sign that a frag is great. This one is unique, priced right, great quality, performance, and creates a certain atmosphere. If this was a niche frag or a Tom Ford, you frag snobs would be all over it. Granted, the bottle is tacky but the name is fitting. Guys my age feel like their worth a million bucks when girls lean in close because we smell awesome. No other frag in my 60+ bottle collection has garnered as much attention and compliments as 1 Million. I've had women of all ages compliment me in public. Women I didn't know who went out of their way to compliment this frag. That's a major quality many frags can't boast. <br />
<br />
Some of the reviews were saying 1 Million was too young etc. Sure, but on the flip side there are frags out there that are too mature. Fragrances CAN'T always appeal to every demographic. Just because you're 50 and this frag is "too young" for you DOES NOT make it a bad scent. <br />
<br />
I understand no fragrance will please everyone. It's just myself and many other reviewers are tired of the "frag snobery" that infiltrates reviews. Like I said, if this was not popular, was a niche brand or something along the lines of TF it'd have much better reviews. Out of 85% of new market offerings, how many really stack up to 1 Million's mass appeal &amp; cost/performance ratio?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="577154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=577154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1083311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1083311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ellej32"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1142249"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1142249.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ellej32" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1083311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1083311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1142249">Ellej32</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-30">07/30/19 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My brother passed away 2 years ago and this was his signature scent, everyone complimented him. I love the smell of this and I wear it to remember him and what he smelled like. Imagine your driving around looking at gorgeous Christmas lights mid December the heating on full but the front window down blowing cold air on your face. Everyone in that car is happy and smiling. This scent is a warm hug on a cold day. I may be biased but this is a 10/10 fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="1083311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=1083311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1418661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1418661" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sam_1998"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1114232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sam_1998" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1418661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1418661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1114232">Sam_1998</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-28">09/28/21 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All the hate towards one million is unbelievable.<br />
Calling it a fragrance for douchebags and attack people who wear this instead of talking about the fragrance itself, It seems people like to hate on popular things. Calling one million a generic fragrance while this was The fragrance who started the trend of this whole sweet and sexy clubbing fragrances for men.<br />
Anyways, one million for me is not just an Ok fragrance, It's an amazing scent with unbelievable performance and longevity, no other designer fragrance can compete with it in terms of performance, Even some oud based niche fragrances. And all reformulation talk here is total BS. New versions still last easy 14 hours plus on my skin. <br />
I think it's worth to buy one million cause now days it's not popular like it used to and many people still don't know the smell and even if they do, they still love it.<br />
Btw, F*** jeremy fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="1418661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=1418661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent409703" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; How unpopular it is.  If everyone is wearing it.  If nobody is wearing it.  If it's strong.  If it's weak.  When I find a fragrance that I love and suits me, I wear it and I love it.  I don't care what anyone says or thinks.  And this one is a definate LOVE.  I am almost done my 100ml bottle and I am a woman ... and I will definately repurchase.  Can't stop sniffing my wrist.   LOVIN it!  &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="409703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=409703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="3747" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc131506" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emiraa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43393.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emiraa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yardley/Baroque-10254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baroque"title="Baroque"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma131506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd131506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43393">Emiraa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-03-05">03/05/11 02:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sorry you guys, but so many men weart this, that is too much!<br />
Every second man smels like 1 Million, why?<br />
For me it is not special at all, to comercial and cheep.<br />
In my opinion man have to smell masculine and unique.<br />
And THIS is not it!<br />

That is just ofofof:(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="131506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=131506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent300251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc300251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="markart123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/306233"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.306233.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="markart123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/212-Men-297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="212 Men"title="212 Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma300251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd300251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/306233">markart123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-11-03">11/03/12 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is just too strong for me. I understand why it has become the infamous clubbing/party fragrance. <br />
<br />
From its pompous gold bullion sprayer to its cloyingly sweet Bazooka Joe bubblegum scent, everything about this fragrance makes it seem like the loud, annoyingly obnoxious girl at the party. <br />
<br />
I made the god-awful mistake of wearing this to one of my evening graduate school classes in NYC. With only 2 sprays hours before class, I took 5 steps into the room when a girl rolled her eyes and said "Who's wearing 1 Million?". <br />
<br />
Be careful with the trigger on this one. If you are looking for class, you will not find it here. Drunken nights trying to hook up with trashy women? 1 million's got your back.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="300251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=300251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent275115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc275115" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GugaGaidzak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/73557"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.73557.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GugaGaidzak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma275115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd275115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/73557">GugaGaidzak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-11">08/11/12 01:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One Billion People Smell like this....<br />
<br />
This is the opportunity for those guys who were dying to wear feminine fragrances but didn't have the balls to do it.<br />
<br />
In no time, this is gonna be like pesticide.<br />
<br />
Boys and girls sharing the same, nauseating odor with different names, in the same place. <br />
<br />
So cheap that we have One Million Drugstore Colognes that smell like this, before this was released.<br />
<br />
So synthetic that it doesnt allow your skin to blend with the notes, which makes the whole alchemy of perfumes, pointless!!! It is supposed to be unique when it touches you!!<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Not to mention the Ad.......Tacky.......You are rich when you have time to spend with the ones you love.... not the things you want!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="275115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=275115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent435456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc435456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tinaelisa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tinaelisa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Rose-N-Roses-58562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Rose N'Roses"title="Miss Dior Rose N'Roses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma435456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd435456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36597">tinaelisa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-12-13">12/13/13 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Please stop the hype!! <br />
So many men are wearing it, thinking it is the most amazing fragrance ever.. But it isn't! It's screams 'HI THERE, HERE I AM, I THNINK I'M SO HOT, but I'm not...' :P Besides that, it really makes me nauseous. And I like a strong (or dark) fragrance on a men, but this is not it!<br />
In stead for a strong fragrance may I suggest JPG Le Male or YSL la nuit de l'homme?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3747"comment_id="435456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-3747.html?ccid=435456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent275573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc275573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="girlsworld"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="girlsworld" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Must-de-Cartier-Gold-32436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Must de Cartier Gold"title="Must de Cartier Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma275573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd275573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67830">girlsworld</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-12">08/12/12 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can detect 1 Million on men instantly, I find it very strong and overwhelming, there is no subtlety with this fragrance, it makes a very loud shouty statement, something which I find unappealing on guys, plus it gives me a headache.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;             return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
